name: Pipeline X Template Registry (full)
description: Detailed registry listing all templates permitted for this repository; used by workflow-driven registry maintenance.

registry.title: Pipeline X Templates (full)
registry.usage: Use this file for registry audit/maintenance workflows. AGENTS.md documents MUST NOT reference this file; they should point to the short registry instead.

allowed_templates.name: Templates AGENTS Guidance
allowed_templates.description: Folder-level instructions for template naming and registry alignment.

allowed_templates.name: Workflows AGENTS Guidance
allowed_templates.description: Workflow template tracking guidance.

allowed_templates.name: Template Creation Workflow
allowed_templates.description: Steps to craft and review new templates.

allowed_templates.name: Template Registry Check and Populate Workflow
allowed_templates.description: Procedure to inventory templates and update the registry catalog.

allowed_templates.name: Template Creation Workflow (Planning Draft)
allowed_templates.description: Minimal template to capture a repeatable plan for creating and validating templates.

allowed_templates.name: Template Review Workflow (Planning)
allowed_templates.description: High-level plan structure for auditing templates, deduplicating, fixing them, and aligning the registry.

allowed_templates.name: DELIVER / INGEST Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Admits DELIVER work only when specifications and readiness gates are confirmed.

allowed_templates.name: PLAN / INGEST Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Guides PLAN stage ingress work: validate scope, guards, and readiness before moving to PROCESS.

allowed_templates.name: SPEC / INGEST Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Ensures SPEC stage begins only when structural plan inputs are ready and guards hold.

allowed_templates.name: Machine State Template for agent_state.json
allowed_templates.description: Defines the minimal, structured shape for REPO_ROOT/.pipeline-x/states/agent_state.json so HALT updates and approvals are recorded consistently.

allowed_templates.name: Template Review meta-plan
allowed_templates.description: Minimal meta-plan structure for reviewing templates and registry alignment.

allowed_templates.name: Workflow Orchestrator meta-plan Template
allowed_templates.description: Guides meta-plan for this repository: decide what needs planning, which templates apply, and which artifacts to create before execution.

allowed_templates.name: DELIVER / OUT Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Packages tested deliverables and supporting evidence for VERIFY and release approvals.

allowed_templates.name: PLAN / OUT Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Packages PLAN PROCESS results into verification-ready artifacts before VERIFY begins.

allowed_templates.name: SPEC / OUT Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Packages SPEC deliverables so VERIFY can audit and prep for DELIVER stage.

allowed_templates.name: Pipeline X Template Registry (full)
allowed_templates.description: Detailed registry listing all templates permitted; used by maintenance workflows.

allowed_templates.name: Pipeline X Template Metadata Schema
allowed_templates.description: Canonical schema for JSON templates stored under .pipeline-x/templates/.

allowed_templates.name: DELIVER / PROCESS Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Executes delivery work, runs tests, and sets tests_pass TRUE when criteria are met.

allowed_templates.name: PLAN / PROCESS Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Creates the minimal actionable todo backlog for PLAN stage once ingress gates pass.

allowed_templates.name: SPEC / PROCESS Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Elaborates structural plans into concrete specifications and interfaces.

allowed_templates.name: DELIVER / VERIFY Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Confirms all DELIVER gates (tests, plan approval, release approval) before advancing to DONE.

allowed_templates.name: PLAN / VERIFY Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Closes PLAN stage by validating backlog completion and preparing SPEC handoff.

allowed_templates.name: SPEC / VERIFY Workflow Template
allowed_templates.description: Confirms SPEC completeness, secures approvals, and prepares DELIVER handoff.

allowed_templates.name: workflow-complicated-build_app-0001
allowed_templates.description: Workflow for heavier build app tasks

allowed_templates.name: workflow-complicated-off_task-0001
allowed_templates.description: Workflow for tricky off-task escalations

allowed_templates.name: workflow-simple-build_app-0001
allowed_templates.description: Minimal workflow for simple build app tasks

allowed_templates.name: workflow-simple-off_task-0001
allowed_templates.description: Workflow for small off-task clarifications

allowed_templates.name: Pipeline X Template Registry (short)
allowed_templates.description: Succinct registry for agent ingestion; see long registry for detailed metadata.

acceptance: JSON parses with registry id/title and generated_at refreshed.
allowed_templates entries include id, name, category, path, version, and enabled plus optional tags/owner/description.
Paths referenced by enabled entries exist under templates_root.
This file is referenced only by maintenance workflows (not AGENTS).
usage_steps: Use this full registry in workflow templates such as template-registry-check-and-populate.md.
Update generated_at and entries when templates are added, removed, or changed.
Keep ids and paths unique across allowed_templates; disable or fix any stale entries.
